function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impacts of COVID-19 measures on utilitarian and hedonic shopping value","Impact":"Reduced consumer confidence and reluctance to visit physical stores","Mitigation":"Implement technology for managing crowding and reassuring consumers about contamination fears","Technologies":"Crowd management systems, social distancing monitoring technology","People":"Retailers, employees, customers","Owner":"Retailers, technology companies"},{"Description":"Fear of contamination causing barriers to visiting stores and using services","Impact":"Decreased foot traffic and customer satisfaction","Mitigation":"Implement technology for social distancing and reducing perceived social crowding","Technologies":"Social distance monitoring, contactless payment systems","People":"Retailers, customers","Owner":"Retailers"}]}
